ISSUE.TITLE: Number of regions Edge Functions are deployed to
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link https://supabase.com/edge-functions (1) https://supabase.com/docs/guides/functions/regional-invocation (2) ## Describe the problem The marketing materials at (1) claim "Edge functions are deployed to 29 regions worldwide". In the documentation at (2), there are 14 given regions that can be used in the x-region header. Deno Deploy, which Edge Functions run on, have recently dropped from running on 35 regions to only 12 (https://docs.deno.com/deploy/manual/regions). Which of these is true? 29 is more than twice as much as 14 (or 12), and it seems important that such a claimed feature accurately reflects the product.
